channel.title: Server Hosting
channel.description: Alright, well my server has been down for at least a month now .. BUT it has been Online and Active For Over 4 Months Before That.But Now When I Try to run my server only i can get online, but this is only if i use the ip 127.0.01 or if i dont use ANY ip what so ever. Like for example when i use my created ip from no-ip.org , example.servegame.com no body can get online with it, even me (the host), meanwhile the the No-Ip Log is telling me that the DNS is current and there no update needed .. does anybody know whats wrong, and please dont say anything about portforwarding because ive portforwarded multiple times and did multiple system restores, so if you have some useful information feel free to let me know.

item.title: Server Hosting

item.description:
@Runescape_GFX wrote:

Did you try portfowarding again?

Did you even try reading what i wrote? DONT SAY ANYTHING ABOUT PORTFORWARDING

Read full topic

item.title: Server Hosting
item.dc:creator: @Runescape_GFX Runescape GFX
item.description:
@Runescape_GFX wrote:

Alright, well my server has been down for at least a month now … BUT it has been Online and Active For Over 4 Months Before That.But Now When I Try to run my server only i can get online, but this is only if i use the ip 127.0.01 or if i dont use ANY ip what so ever. Like for example when i use my created ip from no-ip.org , example.servegame.com no body can get online with it, even me (the host), meanwhile the the No-Ip Log is telling me that the DNS is current and there no update needed … does anybody know whats wrong, and please dont say anything about portforwarding because ive portforwarded multiple times and did multiple system restores, so if you have some useful information feel free to let me know.

Read full topic
